articles.title: Rwanda election: Paul Kagame seeks fourth term as president - BBC.com
articles.description: The leader of the East African country has won over 90% of the vote in all the elections he has run in.
articles.content:
By Danai Nesta Kupemba, BBC News & BBC Great Lakes Service, 
Many Rwandans have only known Paul Kagame as president
Rwanda's President Paul Kagame, feared and admired in equal measure, is seeki… [+5227 chars]
